briefTitle: Olopatadine Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution Study in Chinese Subjects

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Worst Ocular Itching Score During the 24 Hours Prior at Day 14
outcomeMeasures.description: Severity of ocular itching was evaluated as the worst score observed in the past 24 hours prior to each study visit. Ocular itching was assessed by the participant on a scale from 0-4, where 0=None and 4=Incapacitating itch. One eye (study eye) contributed to the analysis.
